Question: Spassmed Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
SpassMed Inc

Product: Time2Words

- Revolutionary AI-powered tool for transforming complex time series data into comprehensive and accessible medical reports
- Harnesses the power of AI to enhance patient care and medical research through efficient data analysis
- Unveiling at CES 2024 to demonstrate how Time2Words redefines the handling of medical reports with time series data, showcasing its potential to reshape the future of medical reporting and healthcare innovation
